text: Christian Lanthaler is an Italian para-alpine skier. He represented Italy at seven Winter Paralympics: in 1992, 1994, 1998, 2002, 2006, 2010 and 2014. In total he won two silver medals in 2002: in the Men's Downhill LW2 event and in the Men's Super-G LW2 event. He also competed in the 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships held in Sestriere, Italy but did not win a medal. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Italian male alpine skiers Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Alpine skiers at the 1992 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1994 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1998 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 2002 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 2006 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 2010 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 2014 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2002 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing
title: Christian Lanthaler
